/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and illumination to the urban setting. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the cityscape.
